title: How will artificial intelligence transform retail pricing in 2020? - Quora

response.answer_text: Inevitably. By having a real time instant valuation tracked to real time sales and distribution, all fluctuations of prices can be calibrated to maximize profits.An AI that can “see” a weak or strong selling point in the process, can either instantly lower or raise a retail price to maximize the profit margin for the product. What would have taken several weeks or months to react to a market trend on a product, can now be reduced to minutes, even seconds. We already see it in the millisecond based sales and purchases of stocks, based on maximizing the exploitation of the stock for tiny portions of profit. On the mass scale that it operates, the profits overall are substantial. That system also operates on a sort of AI.
